decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly casting spells to bring back Arclight Phoenix from the graveyard, putting pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The deck also includes card draw and disruption to maintain tempo and ensure a steady stream of spells to keep bringing back the Phoenix. With a mix of cheap spells and efficient creatures, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and close out the game quickly before they can stabilize. Overall, it is a fast-paced, spell-centric aggro deck with a focus on graveyard recursion and tempo advantage.

This Dimir Aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and controlling the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat. The deck also utilizes aggressive creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares and Moon-Circuit Hacker to pressure the opponent and finish the game quickly. The deck's land base includes various dual lands to support both the blue and black mana requirements of the deck's spells.

The main idea of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful auras that boost the creatures on the battlefield. By attaching multiple auras to a single creature, the deck aims to create a highly aggressive threat that can deal significant damage early in the game. With a focus on enchanting creatures with auras like Ethereal Armor and Staggering Insight, the deck seeks to establish board presence and pressure the opponent into a quick defeat. The inclusion of protection spells like Kaya's Ghostform and Shardmage's Rescue helps to keep key creatures alive and maintain aggression.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and turning them into powerful threats with Ensoul Artifact. By utilizing a mix of aggressive creatures and burn spells, the deck aims to deal damage early and often, pressuring opponents to react or risk falling behind. The inclusion of disruptive cards like Spyglass Siren and Metallic Rebuke helps to protect the board and maintain tempo, while cards like Shrapnel Blast provide reach to finish off opponents. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a fast, aggressive strategy centered around artifact creatures.

This deck focuses on quickly buffing up a creature with auras to deal fast and consistent damage to the opponent. Cards like All That Glitters, Ethereal Armor, and Staggering Insight help to pump up your creatures while cards like Curious Obsession and Sentinel's Eyes help to draw extra cards and keep up the pressure. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful auras, while utilizing protection spells like Kaya's Ghostform and Shardmage's Rescue to keep your threats alive.
